A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a fan of Star Wars for over 35 years and I don't know how the critics can call The Last Jedi \"fresh\". It is a rehash of the Empire Strikes Back and honestly way too long along with the characters that just don't matter. My wife asked if i wanted to see it again with her and I told her that it's not worth it and we can watch it when it comes as a rental. ( I won't be buying this movie)
